Texte: Donna loves to dance, despite not being in her prime youth. All she needs now are decent partners !
Name: Donna1

Texte: Life in the Wide Sky Retirement Home isn’t funny everyday. To be frank, it’s in fact extremly boring./b And right now it looks like there's no way out.
Name: Donna2

Texte: Donna’s got a son, apparently very busy. It’s been a long time since he called her… /b But he’s working hard, and probably just forgot, she says.
Name: Donna3

Texte: Mr.S is apparently some kind of celebrity. Maybe he’s one of those influencers/b talking on private medias…
Name: MisterS1

Texte: Since the Big Hack that happened a decade ago, there’s been less and less public celebrities. /b They all feared to become a target and watch their dark secrets revealed online. Who’s Mr.S really ?
Name: MisterS2

Texte: Even if Mr.S seemed confident enough to become a public figure, /b he’s in fact riddled with insecurities and anxiety.
Name: MisterS3

Texte: Katherine is independent and strong-willed. Becoming the most influential woman on the country wasn’t easy /b and she surely had to sacrifice something along the way.
Name: Katherine1

Texte: Katherine’s family wasn’t really supportive of her carreer. /b But she never talks much about it with anyone but herself.
Name: Katherine2

Texte: Katherine often talks about her dreams. ‘Everyone should have a dream’ , she says. But her’s a secret.
Name: Katherine3

Texte: Ash graduated from med school with success, but couldn’t find a job. /b Their reaction ? : ‘That sucks, but on the other side, more free time ! I guess..?'
Name: Ash1

Texte: Ash’s is rather candid, and amazed by the universe. Nature, Technology, all the parameters that led to the existence of everything we know… Life’s neat.
Name: Ash2

Texte: The 128th time Ash had to define ‘non-binary’ at a family dinner, they decided to give a different definition each time. ‘Just to see if they were listening’
Name: Ash3

Texte: Deepest thought Lyle ever had : School be tellin’ us that getting the diploma is essential, but they ain’t saying much about what this diploma’s for
Name: Lyle1

Texte: Lyle was young when The Big Hack occurred. He never really cared that older people used to have full net access or stuff.
Name: Lyle2

Texte: One of Lyle’s school speakers is in fact Samwell Lowcey, a.k.a Mr.S. He’s very popular among students
Name: Lyle3
